name: Global Smart Processes SPRL
boss: Cristóvão Frederico Schultz Pires de Carvalho
goal:
Global Smart Processes is an international IT consulting company with the mission of adding value to our clients. We approach each of our clients challenges with fresh eyes to deliver customized, unique solutions.

Based on our wide network of partners and a solid technological background of our consultants, we are able to provide high quality IT services responding to your requests in a quickly manner.

Global Smart Processes represents their partners, a set of IT consulting companies and their interests.
interests: Banking and financial services, Business and Industry, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Enlargement, Research and innovation
euInitiatives:
Global Smart Processes is mainly focused on the following areas:
- GDPR - General Data Protection Regulation
- Software Development
- Cloud Solutions
- Consulting Services
- Technology and Innovation
